reviewText: There isn't any story to it, just a group of guys having sex. If you like softcore porn, you might like it. I returned this dvd for a refund.

This film does not seem to be sure exactly what it wants to be. The non sex scenes are so boring that I couldn't even make it to the end of the movie. The sex scenes are bland, stiff, and without a smidgen of sensuality. This is NOT a passionate story. Don't waste your money.

If your inn to light porn and naked gorgeous guys you would love it. I thought it would be equilibrium between making love and the drama. Little dialog and more passionate love scenes. I admit that eight gorgeous guys are smoking.
